TITLE: Upload request

HOME.TITLE: Welcome to the upload request application
HOME.DESCRIPTION: This application is aimed to upload files following an upload request. To get the upload form, please enter the link you have received by email in your browser address bar.

PARAGRAPH.DESCRIPTION: This application form authorizes you to upload file(s) for {{mail}}

AUTH_MODAL.TITLE: Password
AUTH_MODAL.LABEL: Please enter the password you have received.

DATE_HELP_BLOCK: You can upload files until the expiry date or the request closure

SERVER_ERROR.UNKNOWN_ERROR: An error occurred... Please contact your administrator
SERVER_ERROR.ERRCODE_3001: The file is too large to fit in user's space
SERVER_ERROR.ERRCODE_30406: The access to this upload request is forbidden
SERVER_ERROR.ERRCODE_31405: The file associated to this upload request is no more available
SERVER_ERROR.ERRCODE_32401: You do not have access to this upload request

PARAGRAPH_CONFIRM_CLOSURE: Close the request notify end of upload at the request owner. Closure is definitive : you will not be able to upload file later with this request.

404.TITLE: Oops! Page not found.
404.CONTENT: The page you are looking for does not exist. The link to the upload request you received is maybe not valid anymore.
